Sentencas: The present paper describes the fabrication of a bilayer structured solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Its anode consists of molybdenum dioxide (MoO2)-based internal micro-reformer in the form of a porous thin film deposited over conventional Ni/YSZ cermet.
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell performance was measured by directly feeding a mixture of n-dodecane and air at different O-2/C ratios to the anode at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our findings show that the bilayer structured SOFC operating at an O-2/C ratio of 0.64 led to the highest initial cell performance with an initial maximum power density >4.0 W cm(-2).
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At a constant voltage of 0.7V and O-2/C ratio of 0.64, the bilayer structured SOFC showed a gradual increase in power density output over the first 2 h, followed by a stable output of 3.6W cm(-2) for the next 10 h. The tested cell showed no indication of coking and phase transformation.
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When a conventional Ni-based SOFC without the internal micro-reformer was operated under similar conditions, its initial performance and long-term stability were found to be significantly lower than that of bilayer structured SOFC due to Ni oxidation under high O-2/C ratio or coking under the low O-2/C ratio.
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results open up new opportunities for efficiently generating electrical power from various types of high energy density liquid fuels using SOFCs with an integrated MoO2 micro- reformer.
Titulo: Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells
Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells
Nickel-based anode with microstructured molybdenum dioxide internal reformer for liquid hydrocarbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cells
